content:
The width of the scroll bar changes based on hover, it sticks to the left or it sticks to the right... it's also thin or thick...
Does anyone think we should limit those to eg just being thin? (assuming it's possible)
I like how it disappears and reappears.
The thickening behavior is a popular one for scrollbars among people who don't have great mouse control; it makes it faster/easier to actually do a drag on the scrollbar.
Right, I had thought it was something like that, which makes sense.
